mapper.select: /* system.user_mng.getInfo */ SELECT USR.user_id ,USR.auth_cd ,USR.iam_yn ,USR.status_cd ,cc.code_nm AS statusnm ,USR.name ,USR.jikgub_cd ,USR.jikgub_nm ,USR.dept ,USR.tdept_nm ,USR.email ,USR.reg_dt ,USR.gis_auth ,to_char(USR.reg_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') reg_dt_char FROM kcgbd.t_user USR ,kcgbd.t_cmmn_code cc WHERE 1=1 AND cc.code_grp_id = 'STATUSCD' AND cc.code_id = USR.status_cd AND USR.user_id = #{user_id}

/* system.user_mng.getUserSystemMappingList */ SELECT rm1.cnnc_manage_no ,rm1.hive_db_nm ,rm1.sys_nm ,rm2.table_eng_nm ,rm2.db_table_id ,rm2.table_korean_nm FROM kcgbd.t_user_system_mapping usm ,kcgbd.t_rule_meta_0001 rm1 ,kcgbd.t_rule_meta_0002 rm2 WHERE 1=1 AND usm.user_id = #{user_id} AND rm1.cnnc_manage_no = rm2.cnnc_manage_no AND rm2.cnnc_manage_no = usm.cnnc_manage_no AND rm2.table_eng_nm = usm.table_eng_nm ORDER BY sys_nm, table_korean_nm
/* system.user_mng.getAuthList */ SELECT auth.auth_cd ,auth.auth_nm ,auth.reg_dt FROM kcgbd.t_auth auth WHERE 1=1 AND auth.admin_yn = 'N' ORDER BY reg_dt

/* system.user_mng.getInternalSystemList */ SELECT rm1.cnnc_manage_no ,rm1.hive_db_nm ,rm1.sys_nm ,rm2.table_eng_nm ,rm2.db_table_id ,rm2.table_korean_nm FROM kcgbd.t_rule_meta_0001 rm1 ,kcgbd.t_rule_meta_0002 rm2 WHERE 1=1 AND rm1.cnnc_manage_no = rm2.cnnc_manage_no
AND rm1.sys_nm like concat('%',#{search_val},'%')
AND rm2.table_eng_nm like concat('%',#{search_val},'%')
AND rm2.table_korean_nm like concat('%',#{search_val},'%')
/* system.user_mng.chkExist */ SELECT count(*) cnt FROM kcgbd.t_user USR WHERE 1=1 AND USR.user_id = #{user_id}
/* system.user_mng.chkExistFromIam */ SELECT count(*) cnt FROM AO_IAM.VAOI_PPSS_USER_MAP_BD WHERE 1=1 AND USERID = #{user_id}
